titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (S. 524) to authorize the Attorney General to award grants to address the national epidemics of prescription opioid abuse and heroin use.
Providing for consideration of the bill (S. 524) to authorize the Attorney General to award grants to address the national epidemics of prescription opioid abuse and heroin use.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 114-564, by Mr. Collins (GA).
Rule provides for consideration of S. 524. Motion to recommit with or without instructions allowed. Bill is closed to amendments.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 113.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 725.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 232 - 172 (Roll no. 190).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 240 - 165 (Roll no. 191).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (S. 524) to authorize the Attorney General to award grants to address the national epidemics of prescription opioid abuse and heroin use.
